home.description: Refolk! is a Swedish-English and English-Swedish dictionary.
home.filters:
You can refine your search by filtering.
Here's a list of filters that you can add in addition to your search term for reference. Each filter must be preceded by a #. For example, to search for the verb to book, type book #V.
home.data: The dictionary data has been sourced from the excellent Folkets Lexikon project.
home.switch: För att byta till svenska gå till
